title: Bonus Episode: Let's Get Real...
description:
Domonique is joined by his friend and Senior Writer at Andscape, David Dennis Jr. to introduce a new segment called "And..."; it's a working title. The two get into cultural and societal issues surrounding Deshaun Watson, the Little Mermaid, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
